description.p: The factory.ini file contains settings for the Job Scheduler. Note that empty settings are ignored and do not overwrite those made in the .

The location of this file can be specified when starting the Job Scheduler using the option. For example,
…scheduler installation path…\bin\scheduler.exe -ini=C:/Programme/scheduler/config/factory.ini

During installation of the Job Scheduler, the factory.ini file is saved in the …scheduler installation path…\config directory. Calls using the Job Scheduler start script then automatically set the path to this file correctly.
